author: ieb
msg: According to http://www.opensocial.org/Technical-Resources/opensocial-spec-v081/opensocial-reference#opensocial.Name, the opensocial Name object must support
So "UNSTRUCTURED" is missing and "FORMATTED" is added. I consider this a bug / not spec compliant.
